definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: You'd better mark a white line there beforehand.
sentences.chinese: 你最好事先在那里划一条白线。

sentences.english: Avert your eyes to the right side of the road and use the white line as a guide.
sentences.chinese: 将目光移向路的右边，利用白线作为指南。

sentences.english: An airplane flew across the sky trailing white vapor .
sentences.chinese: 一架飞机从空中飞过，尾部拖着一条水汽形成的白线。

sentences.english: Two ends of the rod were tied with a white thread and fixed on the skin near nose with plastic tape.
sentences.chinese: 用白线结扎硅胶条二端后以胶布固定在鼻旁皮肤上。

sentences.english: There are no peaks corresponding to the positions of the white lines.
sentences.chinese: 在白线处并没有什么峰起。

sentences.english: Draw a white line as image below and reduce its Opacity to 60 degree.
sentences.chinese: 下面画一条白线的图像，并减少其不透明度为60度。

sentences.english: What Are the White Lines that Airplanes Draw Through the Sky?
sentences.chinese: 飞机在天上画出的那道白线是什么？

sentences.english: The tsunami drew a line of white fury across the ocean, heading toward the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 海啸画一条白线，狂怒地跨越海洋，冲向海岸线。

sentences.english: My feet will slam the brakes, then stopped at the "cross the line penalty, " the white line.
sentences.chinese: 我的脚会踩住煞车，然后停在“越线受罚”的白线上。

sentences.english: They knew that the black line was formed by trees, and the white line was the sand.
sentences.chinese: 他们知道，黑线是由树木形成，白线是沙子。

sentences.english: Please Line Up On White Line.
Park boundaries are outlined in white.
Only a few simple white lines, it seems that there can not see how high parking costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有几个简单的白线，似乎看不出有多么高停车费用。

sentences.english: All areas bounded by white lines are GUR.
sentences.chinese: 所有用白线圈定的区域属于整修地。

sentences.english: The lower six-sided figure looks as though there are three white lines running through it.
sentences.chinese: 下面的六边形看起来好像里面有三根白线穿过。

definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
